content: ChatGPT appears to have a refined sense of the absurd. I asked it to write a ridiculous (but standard) Republican-Democrat, both-sides New York Times political story, and it did exactly that.

California, Nara, Arizona etc. ¬∑ dangillmor.com

fields.name: Personal site
fields.value: https://dangillmor.com

media_attachments.description:
ChatGPT prompt: Write a news story in the style of the New York Times Washington bureau, on the debate that has arisen because Republicans say the sky is green while Democrats say the sky is blue.

Result: WASHINGTON - A fierce debate has erupted on Capitol Hill, with Republicans claiming that the sky is green and Democrats insisting that it is blue. The disagreement has caused a stir among lawmakers, as each side accuses the other of peddling falsehoods.

At the heart of the dispute is a fundamental disagreement over what constitutes objective reality. Republicans have argued that the sky is green because they believe that the blue color is a result of a liberal media conspiracy to deceive the public. Democrats, on the other hand, point to scientific evidence that clearly shows that the sky is, in fact, blue.

"The sky is blue. That is just a fact," said Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Democrat of New York. "I can't believe we're even having this debate. This is just another example of how far the Republican Party has gone off the rails."

But Republicans remain adamant in their insistence that the sky is green. "The Democrats can talk all they want about 'facts' and 'science', but the truth is that the sky is green," said Senator Ted Cruz, Republican of Texas. "This is just another attempt by the left to push their radical agenda on the American people."

--more--

media_attachments.description: How does a blockchain-based ridesharing system work? A blockchain-based ridesharing system uses distributed ledger technology to facilitate peer-to-peer transactions between riders and drivers without needing a central authority.   Here‚Äôs how it typically works:  Registration: Riders and drivers register on the blockchain-based ridesharing platform by creating a digital identity. The platform may require users to provide personal information, such as their name, phone number and payment information. Ride request: When making a ride request, a passenger must include the pick-up and drop-off locations, the vehicle they need and the fare they are prepared to pay. This information is stored on the blockchain. Driver selection: The algorithm matches the rider with a driver who fits their needs. The ride request may be approved or denied by the driver. Ride confirmation: The smart contract is activated to start the ride if the driver agrees. The rider is informed of the driver‚Äôs arrival and

Here are some things white people lost out on because of racism:

-Walkable cities (because white flight post Civil Rights mean the creation of the suburbs)
-Good, cheap public transit (because they didn't want Those People to go to the newly created suburbs
-Universal single-payer health care (because You Know Who would be "welfare queens")
-Police who are accountable to the public (need to keep Wink Wink Nudge Nudge in line)
-Progressive taxation (because white people can pull themselves up by the bootstraps, just like Elon Musk, and not like I Bet You Can Probably Guess Who)

content:
I know #caturday is over but what an iconic pose

I've always been more of a dog person, until this majestic beast came into my life

He follows me around and cuddles with me, and mostly ignores my partner who raised him from a kitten.

Ironically enough my dog follows my partner around and sleeps at his feet.

Funny how that works

media_attachments.description:
A video with the message of European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen to mark one year since the beginning of Russia‚Äôs war of aggression. 

On-screen, clips of defining moments in the war and Europe‚Äôs acts of solidarity and support.

President von der Leyen‚Äôs message:

‚ÄúFor one year, Ukraine has stunned the world.

Many predicted that Kyiv would fall in a matter of days, but this did not account for the moral and physical courage of the Ukrainian people.

You have resisted the Russian invasion and pushed back against the aggressor against all odds. We are with you.

We have been with you in this existential fight from the beginning. We have massively stepped up our economic, humanitarian, and military support.

Because Ukraine has become the centre of our continent, the place where our values are upheld, where our freedom is defended, and where the future of Europe is written.

Ukrainians are ready to die for the European perspective.

We want them to live with us the European dream.

–°–ª–∞–≤–∞ –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—ñ!‚Äù
